answers.answer: Sounds like it could possibly be toxemia to me.. did your Dr not tell you anything or waiting til after the 24 hr urine test?
I'm assuming his waiting til after the urine test BC we go back Wednesday morning..

Im 37+1 also & just saw dr today.  I asked about preeclampsia because im starting to swell but no protein in urine & blood pressure was fine so she said all was normal. She did say however that if it was I would be admitted to hospital to deliver.  (I asked the question)Do you remember what your blood pressure was? Just curious.Best wishes hun, keep us posted!

When I was at the doctor office they took it twice, once it was 140/90 and the other time it was 148/102. Once we got to the hospital they did it every 20 minutes and they ranged from 146/92 to 133/84...

Thanks, I was just curious to compare to mine.From what I've read on here from others my guess is that they will want you to deliver baby if the blood pressure stays high. And also from what my doc told me.In my prayers!
Thanks ladies! We will see what happens Wednesday at doctors appointment.
So I had my doctors appointment this morning..he put me on a low dosage blood pressure medicine and we also scheduled an induction date for sullivan..which is june 4.

question: I'm 37/1 and when we went to do the doctor today I had high blood pressure and protein in my urine..I've had swelling in my feet/legs/hands for a while but this was a first for the other stuff. Doctor sent me to hospital to have blood drawn, blood pressure taken every 20 minutes..now I'm doing the 24 hour urine test. We go back to doctor on Wednesday...has any other mom had this happen and what was the outcome???
title: bed rest
